 017: """
 018: 
 019: Phase Dispersion Minimization
 020: Ref: http://adsabs.harvard.edu/abs/1978ApJ...224..953S
 021: 
 022: This implementation follows the reference except that variance calculations
 023: are replaced by an unbiased weighted variance to include uncertainties.
 024: 
 025: There is also the PDM2 method which fits splines to the binned data
 026: http://www.stellingwerf.com/rfs-bin/index.cgi?action=PageView&id=29
 027: """
